###### [Palette](https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin\#-palette)  ¬∑  [Ports](https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin\#-ports-and-more)  ¬∑  [Showcase](https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin\#-showcase)  ¬∑  [Docs](https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/tree/main/docs)

[![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/palette/macchiato.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/palette/macchiato.png)

[![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/stargazers)[![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/releases/latest)[![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://github.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/issues)[![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://discord.com/servers/907385605422448742)

Catppuccin is a community-driven pastel theme that aims to be the middle ground between low and high contrast themes. It consists of 4 soothing warm flavors with 26 eye-candy colors each, perfect for coding, designing, and much more!

[![Discord Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/social/latte_discord.svg)](https://discord.com/servers/907385605422448742)[![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/misc/transparent.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/misc/transparent.png)[![Twitter Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/social/latte_twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/catppuccintheme)[![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/misc/transparent.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/misc/transparent.png)[![Mastodon Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/social/latte_mastodon.svg)](https://fosstodon.org/@catppuccin)[![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/misc/transparent.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/misc/transparent.png)[![Reddit Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/social/latte_reddit.svg)](https://reddit.com/r/catppuccin)

Join our community!

[![catppuccin preview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/palette/demo.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catppuccin/catppuccin/main/assets/palette/demo.png)
